definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CartedetransportIllimite</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">ControleVariableChange</field><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:last_ticket_use_name</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_name"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:last_ticket_use_text</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Carte type : illimité</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:last_ticket_use_date</field><value name="VAL"><block type="time_to_formatted_string"><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">dd-MM-yyyy</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:last_ticket_use_heure</field><value name="VAL"><block type="time_as_string"/></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§aTitre de transport valide -
